about_the_game:
Escape Camp Stranded is a single player horror game set at night, in an abandoned campground. This is a game about a man who becomes stranded at a strange cabin site. The road he arrived on is unfinished ahead and has become blocked behind. He must search the cabin site and find a way out of this strange place. Your objective is to investigate your creepy surroundings and find a way out of the site. This demo is created for beta testing purposes and feedback. 

This game contains jump scares.

content_descriptors.notes: There is a nude humanoid monster with no genitalia. This game contains jump scares. This game contains a character that is portrayed as dead.

name: Escape Camp Stranded Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
